---
title: "topic_model"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r librarys}
library(quanteda)
library(tidyverse)
library(topicmodels)
library(stm)
```


```{r read in data}
# read in dfm from dictionary_method_7000_articles
doc_features <- readRDS("dfm.rds")
```

```{r create stm model}
out <- convert(doc_features, to = "stm", docvars = docvars(doc_features))
stm.out <- stm(out$documents, out$vocab, K=8)
  
```
